1293655295294681091.text: So for those angered by the President’s recent executive action on covid relief which includes payroll tax cuts, preventing evictions, and extending UI & student loan relief, please remember that when leadership refuses to work together, the Executive Branch is forced to step in.

1293655294497697792.text: Political gridlock solves nothing. At the end of July, Republicans tried to extend unemployment insurance and Chuck and Nancy said no. It’s been nearly 2 weeks and there’s still no deal, no compromise, and no sign of action being taken on behalf of the American people.

1293644891482918919.text: Now more than ever, we must continue looking for solutions that ensure the most responsible use of your hard-earned taxpayer dollars, & this bill does so in a balanced, bipartisan, and efficient way. More here: https://t.co/wwUF7oZIaU

1253766661649436673.text: After speaking w/ officials at the SBA, we began working directly with Treasury & the WH to get it resolved. Yesterday, Secretary Mnuchin called to tell me small gaming businesses would finally be eligible for participation in the present round of PPP funding.

1253704901731012608.text: Pleased to report our efforts have paid off – small gaming businesses will officially be eligible to receive PPP funding under guidance just released by Treasury. More here: https://t.co/HdcltPuW9q
